title: A traditional Korean fermented food, Gochujang exerts anti-hypertensive effects, regardless of its high salt content by regulating renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system in SD rats
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Jung Eun Park, Anna Han, Eun-Gyung Mun, Youn-Soo Cha
